root.name: Hyperspace Delivery Boy!
root.description: Hyperspace Delivery Boy! is a comedic action/puzzle game originally released for the Pocket PC, and later ported to Windows and Linux.Â It was the first game from Monkeystone Games, the studio founded by Tom Hall, John Romero, Stevie Case and Brian Moon. The game revolved around the player character, Guy Carrington, delivering packing to various locations and solving increasingly complex crate puzzles. The game features flippant and frequently absurdist dialog reminiscent of Hall's previous game, Anachronox.The game was distributed exclusively online. WIth the closure of Monkeystone Games and their website, the game is no longer available for purchase.
